page.title: 19SOCIAL SURVEY
page.content: The children of Eardisley School sent out{questionnaires}to all the houses in this block asking for information about the life in the area.We sent out about 150 questionnaires and received about 130 back. The{population}is about 330. {School children } 65 {Pre-School children } 19 {Adults } 246 Of these 68{retired Therefore there are 178{working adults { 28% of the population are retired. {Occupations:-Farming}is the primary occupation in the area.15% are farmers 16% are{housewives}.There is a big variety of other jobs including nurses doctors,directors,builders,engineers and even one oil driller. We looked at the{transport}used to work and school.In both cases cars were the main form of transport.
